channel.title: NEAR-REALITY REMAKE! V13.2 SOURCE! Redemption!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Redemption! NR-remake with v13.2 source![/CENTER]
Miss the old nostalgic Near-Reality days?!?! So do we! My name is Erik, and my friend Cole have bought the NR v13.2 source and decided to open up Redemption! We have flawless PvP, PvM, duel arena, customs, bloodlust, ganodermic beast, and much more! Cole and I are dedicated to give you, the players, the best RSPS experience out there! Come join us today and see what we’re all about!
Forums: [URL=http://"Redemption.freeforums.org"]Forums[/URL]
Client DL: [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/0zzmi62qqvxamwj/Redemption%20V1.zip"]Client DL[/URL]
Some pics
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1el0qs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2akg0nk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2z4008k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/11ui4c5.jpg[/img] Give us feedback!!!

item.title: NEAR-REALITY REMAKE! V13.2 SOURCE! Redemption!

item.description:
@ErikRDPK wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:2, topic:538981”]claiming that you bought the source gave me a good laugh, thanks.

this is chaos realm source, the official remake[/quote]

Jog on lad.

Read full topic
